GNC V&V Seminar Series

15 September 2020 – 31 December 2025

European Space Agency, Centre National d’Études Spatiales (CNES), Deutsches Zentrum für Luft- und Raumfahrt (DLR), NASA, ONERA WebEx

Speakers: Jeroen Vandersteen (ESA)

This seminar series is a joint Inter-Agency initiative, between ESA/CNES/DLR/NASA & ONERA, to exchange experience and information in Validation and Verification (V&V) techniques for Space Guidance, Navigation and Controls (GNC) Systems, and Attitude and Orbit Control Systems (AOCS).

Please create an indico account (if you do not already have one) and register for the event. After registration approval, you will gain access to the webex details, presentation slides, and previous seminar recordings.

https://indico.esa.int/event/350/

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
